title: The Senate just lobbed a tactical nuke at NASA’s Mars Sample Return program

description: Comparing offline modes between Apple Maps and Google Maps is a tight contest.

title: How a cloud flaw gave Chinese spies a key to Microsoft’s kingdom
description: Hackers stole a cryptographic key that let them forge user identities and slip past defenses.

title: X Corp. asks court to terminate Twitter’s privacy settlement with FTC

title: FDA approves the first over-the-counter birth control pill
description: The move is seen as a victory for reproductive rights, which are under intense attack.

description: CEO says the rocket could be certified for national security missions before mid-2024.

title: The Honor Magic V2 is the thinnest foldable smartphone ever
description: Honor promises a foldable "as slim and lightweight as a typical flagship smartphone."

title: Ohio bans doctor after botched surgeries on TikTok threaten patients’ lives
description: Her TikTok persona was more important than patients' lives, medical board ruled.

title: Musk’s X Corp. sues data scrapers for “severely taxing” Twitter’s servers
description: X Corp. lawsuit says unidentified scrapers forced Twitter to impose rate limits.
